features.name: TikTok service health check
features.description: GET /health returns 200 with status=ok for TikTok service

features.name: TikTok response time < 2s
features.description: Health endpoint responds within 2000ms

features.name: TikTok CORS headers present
features.description: Response includes Access-Control-Allow-Origin header

features.name: TikTok service version returned
features.description: Health response includes service version string

features.name: TikTok uptime reported
features.description: Health response includes uptime or started_at field

features.name: TikTok valid auth token accepted
features.description: Request with valid Bearer token returns 200, not 401

features.name: TikTok missing auth returns 401
features.description: Request without Authorization header returns 401

features.name: TikTok invalid token returns 401
features.description: Request with 'Bearer invalid' returns 401

features.name: TikTok malformed Bearer returns 400 or 401
features.description: Request with 'Bearer ' (empty) returns 4xx

features.name: TikTok token in query param rejected
features.description: Token passed as ?token= without Bearer header is rejected

features.name: TikTok auth error body has message field
features.description: 401 response body includes message or error field

features.name: TikTok OPTIONS preflight passes without auth
features.description: OPTIONS request returns 200 without auth header

features.name: TikTok auth bypass attempt blocked
features.description: Request with X-Forwarded-For spoofing returns same 401

features.name: Send TikTok DM
features.description: POST /api/tiktok/dm/send with username+message returns success=true

features.name: Get TikTok DM conversations
features.description: GET /api/tiktok/dm/conversations returns array

features.name: Post TikTok comment on video
features.description: POST /api/tiktok/comments/post with direct videoUrl returns success=true

features.name: Comment on non-video URL returns error
features.description: POST /api/tiktok/comments/post with non-video URL returns error

features.name: Get video comments list
features.description: GET /api/tiktok/comments/:videoUrl returns comment array

features.name: Get TikTok rate limits
features.description: GET /api/tiktok/dm/rate-limits returns state

features.name: Navigate to TikTok profile
features.description: POST /api/tiktok/navigate with handle opens profile

features.name: Get video engagement stats
features.description: GET /api/tiktok/videos/:id returns views, likes, comments, shares

features.name: Search TikTok videos by keyword
features.description: POST /api/tiktok/search returns video array with author, views

features.name: Get own TikTok profile
features.description: GET /api/tiktok/profile returns follower_count, video_count

features.name: TikTok DM with emoji
features.description: DM message with emoji succeeds

features.name: Get DM messages in conversation
features.description: GET /api/tiktok/dm/messages/:id returns messages

features.name: Comment with @mention
features.description: Comment text with @mention succeeds

features.name: Get trending TikTok sounds
features.description: GET /api/tiktok/trending/sounds returns sounds array

features.name: Get creator analytics
features.description: GET /api/tiktok/analytics returns video performance data

features.name: Reply to TikTok comment
features.description: POST /api/tiktok/comments/reply with commentId+text succeeds

features.name: Like a TikTok comment
features.description: POST /api/tiktok/comments/:id/like returns success=true

features.name: Inbox search for conversation
features.description: POST /api/tiktok/dm/search with username finds conversation

features.name: TikTok comment dry-run
features.description: POST with dry_run=true returns simulated result without posting

features.name: Get video URL from search result
features.description: Search result includes direct video URL for automation

features.name: TikTok missing required body field returns 400
features.description: POST without required field returns 400 with field name in error

features.name: TikTok empty string body returns 400
features.description: POST with empty string for required text field returns 400

features.name: TikTok null value in required field returns 400
features.description: POST with null for required field returns 400 with message

features.name: TikTok wrong content-type returns 415 or 400
features.description: POST with text/plain instead of application/json returns 4xx

features.name: TikTok extremely long string (>10000 chars) handled
features.description: POST with 10001 char string returns 400 or truncates gracefully

features.name: TikTok SQL injection attempt in text field rejected
features.description: Text containing SQL keywords is sanitized, not executed

features.name: TikTok XSS payload in text field is escaped
features.description: Text with <script> tags is returned safely escaped

features.name: TikTok service down → 503 or circuit open
features.description: When downstream unavailable, returns 503 with retry-after header

features.name: TikTok timeout returns 504 with message
features.description: Request that takes >30s returns 504 gateway timeout

features.name: TikTok duplicate action returns idempotent result
features.description: Sending same DM twice returns success without duplicate

features.name: TikTok invalid enum value in body returns 400
features.description: POST with platform='invalid' returns 400 listing valid values

features.name: TikTok error response always JSON
features.description: All 4xx/5xx responses have Content-Type: application/json

features.name: TikTok stack trace not exposed in production
features.description: 500 error response does NOT include stack trace

features.name: TikTok connection refused returns retryable error
features.description: When port not available, error includes retryable=true flag

features.name: TikTok method not allowed returns 405
features.description: GET on POST-only endpoint returns 405 with Allow header

features.name: TikTok unicode emoji in payload works
features.description: Unicode emoji 😀🔥 in text field is preserved

features.name: TikTok RTL text (Arabic/Hebrew) handled
features.description: Arabic text in body is returned correctly

features.name: TikTok newline chars in text preserved
features.description: Text with \n is stored and returned with newlines intact

features.name: TikTok zero-width space character handled
features.description: Text with zero-width space doesn't crash processing

features.name: TikTok URL with query params in text preserved
features.description: URL with ? and & in text is not altered

features.name: TikTok very short text (1 char) works
features.description: Single character text in body accepted

features.name: TikTok duplicate consecutive spaces normalized
features.description: Multiple spaces in text handled without error

features.name: TikTok numeric username as string works
features.description: Username '123456' as string is accepted

features.name: TikTok pagination limit=0 returns empty or default
features.description: limit=0 returns empty array or default page

features.name: TikTok pagination page=9999 returns empty array
features.description: Out-of-range page returns empty array, not 404

features.name: TikTok rate limit headers present on responses
features.description: Response includes X-RateLimit-Limit and X-RateLimit-Remaining

features.name: TikTok 429 returned when limit exceeded
features.description: Exceeding configured rate limit returns 429 with Retry-After

features.name: TikTok Retry-After header is integer seconds
features.description: Retry-After value is parseable integer > 0

features.name: TikTok rate limit resets after window
features.description: After wait period, subsequent requests succeed again

features.name: TikTok concurrent requests handled safely
features.description: 5 simultaneous requests don't cause 500 errors

features.name: TikTok daily cap tracked per account
features.description: GET /rate-limits returns per-account daily_used field

features.name: TikTok force=true bypasses active-hours guard
features.description: POST with force=true during inactive hours still processes

features.name: TikTok DM/action stored in Supabase
features.description: After successful action, row appears in relevant Supabase table

features.name: TikTok no duplicate rows on retry
features.description: Retrying same action doesn't create duplicate DB row

features.name: TikTok timestamps are ISO 8601
features.description: created_at column in stored rows is valid ISO 8601 string

features.name: TikTok platform field set correctly
features.description: Stored row has platform field set to correct platform name

features.name: TikTok contact upserted in crm_contacts
features.description: New user interaction upserts record in crm_contacts table

features.name: TikTok conversation synced to crm_conversations
features.description: Conversation appears in crm_conversations after DM sync

features.name: TikTok message synced to crm_messages
features.description: Individual messages appear in crm_messages after sync

features.name: TikTok RLS policy allows service reads
features.description: Supabase SELECT with service role key succeeds

features.name: TikTok SELECT returns rows with all required columns
features.description: Query result includes id, created_at, platform, content

features.name: TikTok failed action NOT stored
features.description: When action fails (success=false), no row is inserted

features.name: TikTok AI message generation returns string
features.description: POST /ai-message or /suggest-reply returns non-empty string

features.name: TikTok AI output respects platform char limit
features.description: AI-generated text for this platform fits platform char limit

features.name: TikTok AI model field returned in response
features.description: AI response includes model_used field

features.name: TikTok AI error falls back gracefully
features.description: When Claude API fails, returns fallback text or 503

features.name: TikTok AI output is on-topic for niche
features.description: Generated message for solopreneur niche mentions relevant terms

features.name: TikTok AI scoring returns 0-100 integer
features.description: Prospect/content score is integer in [0, 100] range

features.name: TikTok AI reasoning field non-empty
features.description: Score response includes non-empty reasoning or signals array

features.name: TikTok AI structured output is valid JSON
features.description: When model returns structured JSON, it parses without error

features.name: TikTok MCP initialize handshake completes
features.description: Send initialize → receive result with protocolVersion

features.name: TikTok tools/list returns valid schema array
features.description: Each tool has name, description, inputSchema fields

features.name: TikTok tool call returns result content array
features.description: Valid tool call returns result.content[] with type field

features.name: TikTok tool error returns structured error
features.description: Invalid tool params returns isError=true with message

features.name: TikTok MCP over stdio doesn't crash on empty line
features.description: Empty newline in stdio stream doesn't crash server

features.name: TikTok tool result is serializable JSON
features.description: Tool result can be JSON.stringify'd without circular refs

features.name: TikTok sequential tool calls maintain session
features.description: Call tool A then tool B in same session — both succeed

features.name: TikTok unknown tool returns method-not-found
features.description: Call with unknown toolName returns -32601 or error

features.name: TikTok tool timeout returns error gracefully
features.description: Tool that takes >30s returns timeout error, not hang

features.name: TikTok MCP server restarts cleanly after crash
features.description: After killing and restarting, first tool call succeeds

features.name: TikTok session created with unique ID
features.description: Create session returns unique sessionId string

features.name: TikTok session persists between requests
features.description: Two requests with same sessionId share browser state

features.name: TikTok expired session returns 404
features.description: Request with old/expired sessionId returns 404 or error

features.name: TikTok close session frees resources
features.description: Close session endpoint confirms session removed

features.name: TikTok list sessions returns active sessions
features.description: List sessions returns currently active session IDs

features.name: TikTok p95 response time < 5s for core ops
features.description: 95th percentile of 20 sequential calls is under 5000ms

features.name: TikTok 10 concurrent requests all succeed
features.description: 10 simultaneous requests return 200 with no 500 errors

features.name: TikTok large payload (50 items) handled
features.description: Response with 50+ items in array is returned correctly

features.name: TikTok streaming response works if supported
features.description: If SSE/streaming supported, first chunk received within 2s

features.name: TikTok cold start after idle < 10s
features.description: First request after 5min idle returns within 10s
